column1: 451899,Nutrition Assistant,,"Manage preparation of special meals or diets

column5: Provide health and wellness advice to patients, program participants or caregivers
column7: Analyse patient data to determine patient needs or treatment goals
column9: Collect medical information from patients, family members or other medical professionals
column11: Evaluate patient functioning, capabilities or health

column15: Monitor nutrition-related activities of individuals or groups
column17: Monitor patient progress or responses to treatments
column19: Communicate health and wellness information to the public
column21: Collaborate with health care professionals to plan or provide treatment
